boardgame.name: Commands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Colors: Napoleonics
boardgame.description: Commands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Colors: Napoleonics allows you to re-fight epic battles of the Napoleonic era. In this core volume, the focus is on the French and the British, two bitter rivals in the struggle for European preeminence during the time of Napoleon._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As with other games in the Commands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Colors genre, units in both armies can only move and fight when ordered. The command playing cards supply those orders, providing an element of luck that creates a fog of war and presents players with both challenges and opportunities. You must maximize your opportunities by playing your command cards judiciously. How well you handle the diverse units, their weapons, and the terrain, will determine victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: +1 Con _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; +1 Per, November 2012: Dominicon report, Bits and Pieces
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2010 Charles S. Roberts Best Ancient to Napoleonic Era Board Wargame Nominee
2011 Golden Geek Best 2-Player Board Game Nominee
2012 Games Magazine Best New Historical Simulation Game Winner

GMT Games (GMT1014) The Napoleonic historical period has always been one of our favorites and was actually the second historical game that we developed using the Commands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Colors system. The Wars of Napoleon rules at first glance may seem more complex than other Commands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Colors games, but if you are familiar with the game system, you are only a few short steps away from taking Command. Even if you have never played before, learning the fundamentals of the game system is straightforward and will be an enjoyable endeavor. For the game group in Orlando, Wars of Napoleon is one of our favorites. There is a wealth of subtle and bold features that set it apart from other historical periods and it truly embraces the tactical doctrines of France and the various nations that fought against Napoleon.

GMT Games (GMT1014) The Napoleonic historical period has always been one of our favorites and was actually the second historical game that we developed using the Commands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Colors system. The Wars of Napoleon rules at first glance may seem more complex than other Commands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Colors games, but if you are familiar with the game system, you are only a few short steps away from taking Command. Even if you have never played before, learning the fundamentals of the game system is straightforward and will be an enjoyable endeavor. For the game group in Orlando, Wars of Napoleon is one of our favorites. There is a wealth of subtle and bold features that set it apart from other historical periods and it truly embraces the tactical doctrines of France and the various nations that fought against Napoleon.
Commands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Colors: Napoleonics GMT Games Second Printing Publisher: GMT Games
